title: Incident 1
scenario: A customer reports that api.color.com shows your connection is not private which also causes a outage to customers using our API

title: Incident 2
scenario: Jim from Salesforce created a pulse on Metabase via dashboard.color.com, Jim later notifies Color support the wrong COVID-19 results are returning linking to another customer

title: Incident 3
scenario: During a production db upgrade, all Color apps and APIs go down. Customers notifies us that they are receiving 500 errors and LIMSis down.

title: Incident 4
scenario: A new product launch (vaccine) was launched on Monday morning and the eng-oncall immediately starts to get paged `5XX count GreaterThanOrEqualToThreshold of 10`

title: Incident 5
scenario: A new service was created and had application logs sent to Datadog. Someone notices the logs include PHI and PII visible to anyone with Datadog access.
